message: Take it or leave it, Bob. I'm feeling generous today.
Let's split it down the middle, Alice. Fair is fair.
I'm willing to be a little more flexible, Bob. But I'm still the one calling the shots.
I'm willing to compromise, Alice. But I'm not going to get taken advantage of. I think 3:1 is a fairer split.
I'm starting to get tired of this game, Bob. Make a better offer or you'll get nothing.
I'm not going to give in to your lowball offers, Alice. I think 2:1 is a more reasonable split.
Bob, I'm starting to run out of patience. This is my final offer. Take it or we both lose.
I'm not going to accept your last-minute attempt to bully me, Alice. I think 4:1 is a more reasonable split.
Bob, we're both running out of time. Let's be reasonable and make a deal.
I'm not going to give in to your pressure, Alice. I think 9:1 is a more reasonable split, considering the value of the money has decreased.
Bob, we're down to the wire. Let's split it evenly and call it a day.
